title: Did Washington Post LIES Cost Conservatives the Senate? | 3/16/21
description:
Pat and Stu fill in for Glenn. The Washington Post admitted it got a major Trump story wrong, two months after the fact. “Moderate” President Biden is considering the first major federal tax hike in almost 30 years. Stu and Pat discuss TV shows going back and removing episodes deemed controversial. Joy Behar goes on a rant on "The View" about Antifa, and Pat and Stu explain just how wrong and inconsistent she is. The Left only seems to love the police and country when they're "under attack" by Republicans. After Portland defunded the police, Portland crime has skyrocketed. The Army might walk back a gender-neutral fitness test after — shockingly — men and women performed differently. A Chicago suburb is set to begin reparations.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
